text.skinlayers.irisCompatibilityMode.en: Alternative way to render the layers, fixes weird shadows/colors when using Iris shaders. Only turn this setting on when needed. Will break the corner connections.
text.skinlayers.applySodiumWorkaround.en: Workaround for Sodium having flipped Cube sides in some versions(?). Only enable this if you are using Sodium and notice visual issues with the skin layers sides missing.
